main event: A UFO was tracked on radar while observing an aircraft at Kadena, Okinawa.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 minutes and the object was moving at very high speed,The radar picked up the object at a range of 55-65,000 ft,The object disappeared at a 045Â° azimuth after being detected,The observation was made from an altitude of 26,000 ft,Weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility during the sighting.
witness description: Captain Thomas Belsode, pilot of B-52; Captain Alfred E. Brand, co-pilot of B-52
